participant_1.background:
I went to the Amazon rainforest with my older brother and saw monkeys in the wild.
I am thinking that I need to get some help for my addiction to meat.
i am not a big fan of waiting in line.
i drive a ford mustang.
My favorites things are the ones that I share with my mom.

participant_2.background:
I'm a twentysomething female who enjoys horror movies and rock music.
I am a loner and my family are my only friends.
I'm going to try a new recipe for a healthy snack for my kids.
i paddle board on my days off.
I used to be a teacher, but I wanted to spend more time with my family.

content.text: Doing well, thanks for asking! How are you?
Doing great! I just went on a trip to the Amazon rainforest and saw monkeys in the wild!
That's so cool! I've always wanted to go to the rainforest. I love animals.
It was amazing! I'm so glad I went.
I bet. What's your favorite thing about the rainforest?
I think my favorite thing was seeing the monkeys in the wild. They were so cool!
I bet! I love monkeys. They're so cute.
Yeah, they are! I also really enjoyed the hiking and the scenery.
That sounds like an amazing trip! I'm jealous.
It was! I'm glad I went.
I'm sure you'll have many more amazing adventures in your life.
